Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2009 11:48PM lifeblossom wrote: I am simplifying my post.  Should I go with a trial or the more traditional chemo?
Posts.Title: which treatment should I go with? lifeblossom Wyoming

Posts.Content: lifeblossom wrote: I am recently diagnosed with bc and have met with 2 different oncologists.  I am can go with either of the following 2 treatments: weekly carboplatin plus nabpaclitaxel (a stage 3 trial at UCI breast cancer research) OR the tried and true adramycin plus cytoxan every other week at a private hospital.  Any advice which of the two treatments I should go with? I have cancer in both breasts and it is fairly agressive (tumor is 6 cm x 4 cm x 3 cm) but has not spread to the nodes. Log in to post a reply
